tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    treatment_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Patient (
   patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   patient_name VARCHAR(100),
   age INT,
   gender VARCHAR(10),
   admission_date DATE,
   discharge_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Outcome (
   outcome_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patient(patient_id),
   treatment_id UUID REFERENCES Treatment(treatment_id),
   outcome VARCHAR(100),
   outcome_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Outcomes (
  outcome_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  treatment_id INT NOT NULL,
  policy_id INT,
  outcome_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    condition VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Patient_Treatments (
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_id INT,
    treatment_date TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, treatment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (treatment_id) REFERENCES Treatments(treatment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Treatment_Outcomes (
    outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_id INT,
    outcome VARCHAR(200),
    outcome_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (treatment_id) REFERENCES Treatments(treatment_id)
);
